column5: My place is close to Texas A&M University (2.5 miles). Ideal for couples, solo adventurers, and business travel. Available for short term or long term rental.  There are 2 rooms available for rent. Each has it's own bathroom. Myself (an owner/occupant) and my roomate stay in the upstairs 2 bedrooms. The 2 downstairs bedrooms are adjacent to the living room and kitchen.
column8: Barracks Townhomes Momma Bear Unit B
